name: At Peace With Peasants
description:
You are a wealthy lord, and the King himself has asked you for a favour.

What will it be? A daring adventure? An unbeatable dragon?

Much worse. You have to talk to the peasants.

Earn appreciation and see if the villagers start to like you! There are multiple good endings that depend on you choices.

Important:

Point-and-click to Interact

Use alt + f4 to quit.
